== TypeScript ==

1.) npm init
2.) npm install --save-dev jest ts-jest @types/jest

3.) Edit your scripts so it looks like this:
        
        "scripts": {
           "test": "jest"
        },
        
4.) npx ts-jest config:init

5.) Sometimes theres an annoying error that pops up. Add this to your
jest.config.js to disable it.

transform: {
    '^.+\\.(ts|tsx)?$': ['ts-jest', {diagnostics: {ignoreCodes: ['TS151001']}}],
    "^.+\\.(js|jsx)$": "babel-jest",
}

== JavaScript ==

1.) npm init
2.) Make a .babelrc in root and paste this code in there
{
    "env": {
      "test": {
        "plugins": ["@babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs"]
      }
    }
  }
3.) Then dump this in terminal and click enter

npm install --save-dev jest @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs
